text: MBLAQ is a South Korean boy band. They have five members: Seungho, G.O., Joon, Thunder, and Mir. The letters MBLAQ is an initialism for Music Boys Live in Absolute Quality. ==Discography== ===Korean discography=== ;Studio albums * 2011 : BLAQ Style ;Repackaged albums * 2011 : BLAQ Style - 3D Edition ;Extended plays * 2009 : Just BLAQ * 2010 : Y * 2011 : Mona Lisa * 2012: 100% Ver. * 2013: Sexy Beat ;Repackaged EP's * 2012 : BLAQ%Ver. * 2013 : TBA ;Digital Singles * 2011: White Forever * 2011: You&I; ===Japanese discography=== ;Compilations * 2012 : BLAQ Memories ;Singles * 2011 : Your Luv * 2011 : Baby U! * 2013 : Mona Lisa ;DVDs * 2011 : Mona Lisa Style * 2012 : This is War Music Story * 2012 : MBLAQ 'Men in MBLAQ' First Concert DVD * 2013 : The BLAQ% Tour Category:2009 establishments in South Korea Category:K-pop music groups Category:Musical groups established in 2009 Category:South Korean boy bands
title: MBLAQ
